languages.text: Это существо получает +10% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и возможность атаковать дважды за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, а также {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, равное 50% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: This character gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and the ability to attack twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Also, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This character gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to attack twice per turn. Also, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 50% of their maximum wounds.

languages.text: 此角色{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}暴击率提高10%，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}提高2点，每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}可攻击两次。此外，此角色还获得了{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的50%。

languages.text: このキャラクターはクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}+10%、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} +2、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に2回攻撃できるアビリティを得る。さらに、最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の50%に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。

Also, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: Este personaje gana +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y la capacidad de atacar dos veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. También gana {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} por valor del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas.
languages.original_text: This character gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and the ability to attack twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Also, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Este personaje gana +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de atacar dos veces por turno. También gana {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} por valor del 50 % de sus heridas máximas.

languages.text: Dieser Charakter erhält +10 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und die Fähigkeit, pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zweimal anzugreifen. Außerdem erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} entsprechend 50 % seiner maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

Außerdem erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} entsprechend 50 % seiner maximalen Wunden.

Dieser Charakter erhält +10 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zweimal anzugreifen. Außerdem erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} entsprechend 50 % seiner maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Ce personnage bénéficie de +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique, de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, et acquiert la capacité d'attaquer deux fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Par ailleurs, il reçoit un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égal à 50 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum.
languages.original_text: This character gains +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and the ability to attack twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Also, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ce personnage bénéficie de +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique, de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, et acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'attaquer deux fois par tour. Par ailleurs, il reçoit un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égal à 50 % de sa réserve de blessures maximum.

languages.text: Bu karakter; +%10 kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g}, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} iki kez saldırabilme kabiliyeti kazanır. Ayrıca maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %50'si kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı elde eder.
